title: Update shared header title to ZenBreathe

requirements.summary: Update the shared layout header title text to display “ZenBreathe” instead of “Breathe” across all routes that show the header.
acceptanceCriteria: When viewing any route that shows the shared header (e.g., Home, Stats, Custom, Settings, About), the centered header title reads “ZenBreathe”.
No other header layout behavior changes (e.g., Home-only icons, spacing) aside from the title text.

file_operations.description: In the shared Layout header, change the centered <h1> title text from “Breathe” to “ZenBreathe” without altering any surrounding header logic (Home-only icons, spacing placeholders, or footer visibility behavior).
